names.pinyin: bao luo huo yu tang jia jian

actions: Cools the Blood, stops bleeding, clears Toxic Heat, astringes fluids and generates flesh.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, unblocks the menses, promotes urination, drains Dampness, tonifies the Kidneys and Liver and strengthens the tendons and bones.
Invigorates the Blood, dissolves Phlegm, resolves Stagnation, softens hardness and dissipates nodules.
Promotes the movement of Blood, promotes lactation and invigorates the channels.
Promotes the movement of Qi, invigorates the Blood, opens the Middle Jiao, unblocks the channels and promotes water metabolism.
Promotes the movement of Qi, dissipates clumps and stops pain.
Invigorates Blood circulation, dispels Blood Stasis, regulates Qi, dissolves accumulations and alleviates pain.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood and regulates the menses.
Invigorates and tonifies the Blood, activates the channels and relaxes the sinews.
Direct Lower Jiao Fire downward to protect Kidney water.
Reduces Phlegm, softens areas of hardness, promotes urination and reduces edema.

symptoms: Lower abdominal distention and pain, especially along the sides of the abdomen
Stabbing pain in the lower abdomen
Abdominal pain which becomes worse as the period approaches
Chest and flank distention and pain
Possible abnormal vaginal discharge which is yellow and foul-smelling
